1 #include "position.h"
2 
3 position::position (double altitude) : altitude(altitude)
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  double loop_rate;
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 5.0);
8  rate = new Rate(loop_rate);
9  int queue_size;
10  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
11  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/goal_tolerance", goal_tolerance, 0.1);
12  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/visualize", visualize, false);
13 
14  // no pose received yet
15  pose_valid = false;
16 
17  // init ros communication
18  out_of_bounds_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds>("area/out_of_bounds");
19  out_of_bounds_client.waitForExistence();
20  occupied_sector_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetSector>("obstacle_detection/get_occupied_sector");
21  occupied_sector_client.waitForExistence();
22  pose_sub = nh.subscribe("pos_provider/pose", queue_size, &position::pose_callback, this);
23  pose_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("pos_controller/goal_position", queue_size, true);
24  if (visualize)
25  visualize_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("swarm_behaviors_position/goal", queue_size, true);
26 
27  // init position and yaw
28  while (ok() && pose_valid == false) {
29  ROS_DEBUG_ONCE("Waiting for valid pose...");
30  rate->sleep();
31  spinOnce();
32  }
33 
34  // init goal
35  goal.pose = pose;
36 }
37 
38 position::~position ()
39 {
40  delete rate;
41 }
42 
43 double position::bearing (geometry_msgs::Pose p) const
44 {
45  double b = remainder(atan2(p.position.y - pose.position.y, p.position.x - pose.position.x) - get_yaw(), 2*M_PI);
46  if (b < 0)
47  b += 2*M_PI;
48  return b;
49 }
50 
51 geometry_msgs::Pose position::compute_goal (double distance, double direction) const
52 {
53  return compute_goal(pose, distance, direction);
54 }
55 
56 geometry_msgs::Pose position::compute_goal (geometry_msgs::Pose start, double distance, double direction) const
57 {
58  geometry_msgs::Pose goal;
59 
60  // calculate position
61  goal.position.x = start.position.x + distance * cos(direction);
62  goal.position.y = start.position.y + distance * sin(direction);
63  goal.position.z = altitude;
64 
65  // calculate orientation
66  tf2::Quaternion orientation;
67  orientation.setRPY(0, 0, direction);
68  goal.orientation = tf2::toMsg(orientation);
69 
70  return goal;
71 }
72 
73 double position::dist (geometry_msgs::Pose p) const
74 {
75  return dist(pose, p);
76 }
77 
78 double position::dist (geometry_msgs::Pose p1, geometry_msgs::Pose p2) const
79 {
80  return hypot(p1.position.x - p2.position.x, p1.position.y - p2.position.y);
81 }

83 geometry_msgs::Pose position::get_pose () const
84 {
85  return pose;
86 }

88 double position::get_tolerance () const
89 {
90  return goal_tolerance;
91 }

93 double position::get_yaw () const
94 {
95  return get_yaw(pose);
96 }
97 
98 bool position::move (geometry_msgs::Pose goal)
99 {
100  // goal is out of bounds
101  if (out_of_bounds(goal)) {
102  ROS_ERROR("Cannot move to (%.2f,%.2f) because it is out of bounds!", goal.position.x, goal.position.y);
103  stop();
104  return false;
105  }
106 
107  // obstacle in direction of goal
108  else if (occupied(goal)) {
109  ROS_ERROR("Obstacle ahead, stop moving!");
110  stop();
111  return false;
112  }
113 
114  // goal changed
115  if (this->goal.pose.position.x != goal.position.x || this->goal.pose.position.y != goal.position.y) {
116  // visualize goal
117  if (visualize) {
118  geometry_msgs::PointStamped wp;
119  wp.header.stamp = Time::now();
120  wp.header.frame_id = "local_origin_ned";
121  wp.point = goal.position;
122  visualize_pub.publish(wp);
123  }
124 
125  // create goal pose
126  this->goal.header.stamp = Time::now();
127  this->goal.pose = goal;
128  this->goal.pose.position.z = altitude;
129 
130  // send goal pose to cps controller
131  pose_pub.publish(this->goal);
132  }
133 
134  // successfully published goal set point
135  return true;
136 }
137 
138 bool position::occupied (geometry_msgs::Pose pose)
139 {
140  // get occupied sector
141  cpswarm_msgs::GetSector ocs;
142  if (occupied_sector_client.call(ocs)) {
143  // no obstacles
144  if (ocs.response.min == ocs.response.max)
145  return false;
146 
147  ROS_DEBUG("Goal %.2f in occupied sector [%.2f,%.2f]?", bearing(pose), ocs.response.min, ocs.response.max);
148 
149  // check if pose is in this sector
150  if (ocs.response.max > 2*M_PI && bearing(pose) < M_PI)
151  return ocs.response.min <= bearing(pose) + 2*M_PI && bearing(pose) + 2*M_PI <= ocs.response.max; // always max > min
152  else
153  return ocs.response.min <= bearing(pose) && bearing(pose) <= ocs.response.max; // always max > min
154  }
155  else {
156  ROS_ERROR("Failed to check if goal is occupied");
157  return true;
158  }
159 }
160 
161 bool position::out_of_bounds (geometry_msgs::Pose pose)
162 {
163  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds oob;
164  oob.request.pose = pose;
165  if (out_of_bounds_client.call(oob)) {
166  return oob.response.out;
167  }
168  else {
169  ROS_ERROR("Failed to check if goal is out of bounds");
170  return true;
171  }
172 }
173 
174 bool position::reached ()
175 {
176  ROS_DEBUG("Yaw %.2f --> %.2f", get_yaw(pose), get_yaw(goal.pose));
177  ROS_DEBUG("Pose (%.2f,%.2f) --> (%.2f,%.2f)", pose.position.x, pose.position.y, goal.pose.position.x, goal.pose.position.y);
178  ROS_DEBUG("%.2f > %.2f", dist(pose, goal.pose), goal_tolerance);
179 
180  // whether cps reached goal position, ignoring yaw
181  return dist(pose, goal.pose) <= goal_tolerance;
182 }
183 
184 void position::stop ()
185 {
186  // create goal pose
187  goal.header.stamp = Time::now();
188  goal.pose = pose;
189  goal.pose.position.z = altitude;
190 
191  // send goal pose to cps controller
192  pose_pub.publish(goal);
193 
194 }
195 
196 double position::get_yaw (geometry_msgs::Pose pose) const
197 {
198  tf2::Quaternion orientation;
199  tf2::fromMsg(pose.orientation, orientation);
200  return tf2::getYaw(orientation);
201 }
202 
203 void position::pose_callback (const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped::ConstPtr& msg)
204 {
205  // valid pose received
206  if (msg->header.stamp.isValid())
207  pose_valid = true;
208 
209  // store new position and orientation in class variables
210  pose = msg->pose;
211 
212  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(1, "Yaw %.2f", get_yaw());
213  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(1, "Pose [%.2f, %.2f, %.2f]", pose.position.x, pose.position.y, pose.position.z);
214 }
